name: Haunted Valley Of Beanwood
description:
While on your way to Beanwood, your car ran out of fuel in the haunted valley of Beanwood. Legend says a monster roams the land looking for unfortunate victims to devour.

Gameplay

Your task is to refuel your car by collecting enough fuel canisters while avoiding the hideous monster of Beanwood.

Hiding is essential as the monster can't see but, it can sense fear.

Controls

You move around using the W, A, S, and D keys, Sprint using the Left-Shift key, Look around using the Mouse and, Interact using the F key.
